Founder of the Lodi Dynasty

Bahlul Lodi founded the Lodi dynasty, the first Afghan (Pashtun) dynasty of the Delhi Sultanate. He reorganized the scattered Sultanate and successfully annexed the Jaunpur Sultanate to Delhi. He treated nobles as equals, and preferred to sit with them on the carpet rather than on the throne.
